channel.title: Home on the willy weave
channel.description: Recent content in Home on the willy weave

item.title: earmarked
item.description: you as a book the page-turner every page earmarked, highlighted, and footnotes scribbled in just so I could feel something just so I could help you write those unwritten chapters

item.title: solitude
item.description: solitude my solitude what I’ve learned from you what I’ve learned of me It was never about them It was about me And how I care for them

item.title: let it happen
item.description: may mysteries always lie just around each corner what I need, will come what seeks me, will find me

item.title: a way with
item.description: I usually have a way with words but I saw you and

item.title: are you listening?
item.description: some days you listen to the music some days you are the music it’s always been there but are you listening?

item.title: the wanderers
item.description: we are not special we are mere wanderers of both space and time we create the special by finding someone else who enjoys the mundane just as much wandering, together

item.title: the glass box
item.description: trees sway to and fro behind double panes I sit for what else can this world offer but marbled skies and an open field

item.title: cosmic quandary
item.description: oh, I would have found you in different forms in different lifetimes across timelines, dimensions the shared energy and atoms cosmically inseparable

item.title: beginnings are such delicate times
item.description: for all things preposterous and pronounced letting the wildest reaches of my imagination run rampant on an infinite digital canvas for once you’ve read, you cannot unread let each piece hit you where it must though I hope it soft these are my dreams, hopes, thoughts, joys for all time, always
